name: New York Chicken Sandwiches
description: Here’s an Epic take on a popular New York street sandwich called “chicken spiedie” (pronounced “spee-dee”). This grilled meat on a skewer is renowned for its bright lemony and herby flavour that typically takes hours of marinating. Our streamlined version slashes prep and cook time, and still delivers a punch of flavour! Bump up the fibre and swap the hoagie rolls for whole wheat buns.

ingredients.name: Lemon Garlic Chicken Seasoning or Rotisserie Chicken Seasoning

preparation: Measure 1⁄2 tbsp seasoning in a small bowl; stir in mayonnaise and water. Set aside.
Chop chicken into cubes. In large bowl, toss chicken cubes with oil and remaining seasoning. Thread onto three Grill Boss Skewers.
Grill with lid closed 8–10 min, or until chicken is cooked through. Turn skewers often so they cook evenly.
Split and toast rolls, if desired. To serve, slide meat from skewers, then divide between rolls. Drizzle with sauce.
tips: Too chilly out to grill? You can still enjoy this recipe year-round! Place Cooling Racks on Sheet Pan and arrange skewers on racks. Broil 4–5 min per side, or until chicken is cooked through.
If you don’t have Grill Boss Skewers, use six small (6") skewers instead.

products.name: Lemon Garlic Chicken Seasoning (3pk)
summary: With just the right amount of garlic and a citrus squeeze, this seasoning makes it easy to cook a whole juicy chicken in the microwave in just 20 minutes using a Multipurpose Steamer. This is one of those ‘set it and forget it’ meals that works well for a weeknight dinner or a dinner party.
